Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking across a bridge spanning the Ashton River.
Room.LongDescription: As you cross over the ancient bridge over the Ashton River, you can see the impressive design of the Wakarimasu Park. The Ashton River is relativly wide, but that is to be expected as the mountains snows have produced a lot of water lately. The river flows west towards the ocean.
